title:
Quasinormal modes and greybody factor of Schwarzschild Black Hole in the
  Cold Dark Matter Halo
authors:
Shi-Jie Ma, Rui-Bo Wang, Tian-Chi Ma, He-Xu Zhang, Jian-Bo Deng and
  Xian-Ru Hu
abstract:
In this article, we firstly studied wave function in static spherically
symmetric spacetime and obtained effective potential of perturbed fields with
spin. Then we applied $6^{\rm{th}}$ order WKB approximation to analyze
quasinormal modes of Schwarzschild black hole in the Cold Dark Matter halo in
perturbed fields with different spins and derived quasinormal frequencies.
Further, to study the relation between quasinormal frequencies and optics, we
compare the results of WKB method with eikonal limit formula. At last, we
discussed greybody factor in different perturbed fields under this spacetime.
